rows.label: qst201618_msg0001
rows.name:
The concert preparations are complete,
and it's finally showtime, mo!

rows.label: qst201618_msg0002
rows.name:
Let's let the [ML:TownFlag digit=F16 value=1 ] fans hear
your beautiful singing
voice, Nanakoori-san, mo!

rows.label: qst201618_msg0008
rows.name: Encourage her to do it same as always

rows.label: qst201618_msg0009
rows.name: Tell her to breathe and calm down

rows.label: qst201618_msg0011
rows.name:
You're right. I practiced a lot,
so if I just do it like I always
do... like I always do...

rows.label: qst201618_msg0014
rows.name:
Thanks to you, I've calmed
down a bit. Thank you...

rows.label: qst201618_msg0015
rows.name:
I'll try my best at the concert.
Though I'm not very confident...
